description:
This additional content includes:

- "A Bewitching Dance - Mizutsune: Piano Version"
- "Scarlet Feast - Malzeno: Piano Version" BGM
- "Beyond the Endless Deep Blue: Piano Version" BGM
- "Light Born of Darkness - Shagaru Magala: Piano Version" BGM

Enjoy these piano arrangements in different locations around Elgado Outpost!

- Music can be set in the Room Customization section of the Housekeeper menu.
- Music cannot be changed during quests.
name: "Monster & Title Music: Piano Version" BGM
